thread.title: France Triggers Terror Alert After School Shooting [Video]
thread.title_full: France Triggers Terror Alert After School Shooting [Video]

author: Jack Davis
title: France Triggers Terror Alert After School Shooting [Video]
text:
France Triggers Terror Alert After School Shooting [Video] Second incident of the day... by Jack Davis March 16, 2017 at 6:44am Share on Facebook 674 Tweet Email Email Print Advertisement - story continues below 
France sent out a terrorist attack warning Thursday after a shooting took place at a high school in the southern French city of Grasse . Image from scene of the shooting in Grasse, France. pic.twitter.com/8t07b4J4i9 
— Paul Joseph Watson (@PrisonPlanet) March 16, 2017 
Police have arrested one person on the scene at the Lycee Alexis de Tocqueville. Advertisement - story continues below 
The French interior ministry said a “public security event” was under way at the school. 
One report indicated that the shooting began as an incident between two students. 
Police have said one person fled the scene. 
Initial reports said that the headmaster was among those shot. One other person was reported wounded. 
One man reportedly entered the school armed with several weapons. 
Grasse is located near Nice, which was the site of a July 14 attack in which a truck driver plowed through a crowd of people, leaving 86 dead and about 300 injured. 
The attack was the second incident of the day in France. Advertisement - story continues below
